content.question: ​The domain of the function <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> is <math alttext="negative 6 less or equal than x less or equal than 12"><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>12</mn></math>. If the function <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3 g open parentheses x over 2 close parentheses"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced></math>, what is the domain of <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="negative 18 less or equal than x less or equal than 36"><mo>-</mo><mn>18</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>36</mn></math>
​<math alttext="negative 12 less or equal than x less or equal than 24"><mo>-</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>24</mn></math>
​<math alttext="negative 3 less or equal than x less or equal than 6"><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>6</mn></math>
​<math alttext="negative 2 less or equal than x less or equal than 4"><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>4</mn></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="negative 12 less or equal than x less or equal than 24"><mo>-</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>24</mn></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
